evidence.claim: Oxygen Health utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and API Gateway services for scalable application performance.
The company supports HL7 FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Oxygen Health processes X12 EDI transaction sets for healthcare billing.
Integration patterns include Webhooks for real-time data notifications to partner systems.

icp.icp_reason: Oxygen Health uses X12 EDI and APIs, indicating alignment with ICP characteristics.
